title: Arithmetic localisation and completion of spectra
abstract:
This is an exposition of facts about p-local spectra, p-complete spectra and
modules over the p-complete sphere spectrum, including homological criteria for
finiteness. Most things are well-known to the experts, with a couple of
potential exceptions: every dualisable p-complete spectrum is the p-completion
of a finite spectrum, and the category of modules over the p-complete sphere
has homological Brown representability.
